title: nAvE nalam tarum
sahitya:
nAvE nalam tarum tiru nAmanArAyaNi shiva Om ena navilvAi


anupallavi

  sAvE aNugAda jIva shakti tarum sAyujya padaviyum unnait-tEDi varum


caraNam    surangat-tangam urugi sokkat-tangam Aghi shuDarmaNi muDiyAgi shUzhulagai Alum
varam perum kalaigaLum param peru nilaigaLum shiram peru divviya jIvanam kanindiDum
